T02D1627:228b-1: ma h'a m'a y'a tantra aa nu he ru ka s'a dha na no bi ka //
T02D1627:228b-3: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i he ru ka'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1627:228b-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1627:228b-5: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i bdag nyid rgyal /
T02D1627:228b-6: rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag byas te //
T02D1627:228b-7: de yi gzhung lugs bsdus pa yi //
T02D1627:228b-8: sgrub thabs rim pa bshad par bya //
T02D1627:228b-9: dad byams snying rjer ldan pa yis //
T02D1627:228b-10: yang dag byang chub yid byas te /
T02D1627:228b-11: sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs ldan //
T02D1627:228b-12: 'jig rten chos brgyad mnyam sems shing //
T02D1627:228b-13: sngags rgyud dngos grub stsol rig pas //
T02D1627:228b-14: rnal 'byor spyod dang mthun la rol //
T02D1627:228b-15: bde ba'i gnas su nyer 'dug ste //
T02D1627:228b-16: snying gar nyi ma h'um bzhag nas //
T02D1627:228b-17: 'od zer las byung mchod pa yis //
T02D1627:228b-18: mdud na du bdag po yongs mchod nas //
T02D1627:228b-19: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs byas //
T02D1627:228b-20: de nas stong nyid bsgom bya ste ;
T02D1627:228b-21: aom sh'u nya t'a dzny'a na dzra sv'a wa a'a tma ko& ham /
T02D1627:228b-22: zhes pa yid kyis brjod par bya //
T02D1627:228b-23: mkha' la dmar po 'dab bzhi pa'i //
T02D1627:228b-24: padma la gnas nyid kyil la //
T02D1627:228b-25: thig le dkar po lnga bsams te //
T02D1627:228b-26: dang po spro dang bsdu byas nas //
T02D1627:228b-27: sngon du goms pa'i byams chen dang //
T02D1627:228b-28: snying rje la sogs rang bzhin can //
T02D1627:228b-29: phyogs bzhir thig le las byung ba'i //
T02D1627:228b-30: gar gyi tshul gyis 'khyud dga' ba'i //
T02D1627:228b-31: rtag tu mkha' 'gro ma bzhi yis //
T02D1627:228b-32: bskul bar rnam par bsam par bya //
T02D1627:228b-33: ha les hi bi ya si aa //
T02D1627:228b-34: ka ma lu pra ba yu badzre /
T02D1627:228b-35: aa la la la la ho //
T02D1627:228b-37: aa ra ha ni te na /
T02D1627:228b-40: ka ma lu ma h'a su te na /
T02D1627:228b-41: de nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las //
T02D1627:228b-42: sems can bsgral ba'i bsam pa yis //
T02D1627:228b-43: 'gro ba de nyid sgyu ma bzhin //
T02D1627:228b-44: ji ltar 'byung las rnam gzigs te //
T02D1627:228b-45: dbus ma'i thig le las byung sngo //
T02D1627:228b-46: sa bon h'um las snying rje'i dngos //
T02D1627:228b-47: ye shes lnga dang sku gsum bdag / mchog tu dga' zhing mdzes pa yi //
T02D1627:228b-48: zhal bzhi pa dang phyag bzhi pa //
T02D1627:228b-49: yan lag rnams ni thal bas byugs //
T02D1627:228b-50: rtsa zhal lus bzhin kha dog sngo //
T02D1627:228b-51: g-yas pa'i zhal ni ser ba dang //
T02D1627:228b-52: rgyab ma dkar zhing dmar bar snang //
T02D1627:228b-53: g-yon pa ma rgad bzhin du 'bar //
T02D1627:229a-2: phyag rgya rnam pa lnga yis brgyan //
T02D1627:229a-3: mgo skyes kham pa gyen bsgreng pa //
T02D1627:229a-4: mi bskyod thod pa'i dbu rgyan mtho //
T02D1627:229a-5: g-yas na ka p'a la dang mda' //
T02D1627:229a-6: kha tv'am ga dang gzhu ni g-yon //
T02D1627:229a-8: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas mdzad //
T02D1627:229a-9: rang snang sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1627:229a-11: zhal ni lha mo bzhir gzigs pa'i //
T02D1627:229a-12: gar lta he ru ka bsam bya //
T02D1627:229a-13: mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mchan la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1627:229a-14: de la shar phyogs kyi 'dab ma la ni rdo
T02D1627:229a-15: rje mkha' 'gro ma kha dog sngon po ste sngon
T02D1627:229a-19: sa dang me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa rnam par dag pa /
T02D1627:229a-20: g-yas pa na rdo rje dang ka p'a la 'dzin pa /
T02D1627:229a-21: g-yon pa na dril bu dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1627:229a-22: lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma la ni mnyam ba nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T02D1627:229a-23: chu'i khams la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can /
T02D1627:229a-24: dpal rin chen mkha' 'gro ma phyag na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang tri sh'u la bsnams pa /
T02D1627:229a-25: g-yon pa na bhandha dang ce sbyang gi mgrin pa dam du 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1627:229a-30: nub kyi 'dab ma la ni padma mkha' 'gro ma dkar zhing dmar ba ste /
T02D1627:229a-31: me dang so sor kun du rtog pa la sogs
T02D1627:229a-32: pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can gzhon zhing mdzes
T02D1627:229a-33: pa ste / zhal dkar zhing dmar ba dang /
T02D1627:229a-34: gser bzhus pa lta bu dang /
T02D1627:229a-37: phyag g-yas pa na sna tshogs padma dang mda'o //
T02D1627:229a-38: g-yon na ni ka p'a la dang gzhu'o //
T02D1627:229a-39: byang phyogs kyi 'dab ma la ni sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma ljang gu ste ljang gu dang /
T02D1627:229a-42: sngon po'i zhal can bya ba grub pa dang /
T02D1627:229a-43: rlung la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma ste /
T02D1627:229a-44: g-yas pa na ral gri dang d'a ma ru /
T02D1627:229a-45: g-yon pa na zhags pa dang ka p'a la'o //
T02D1627:229a-46: lha mo thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa zhal bzhi dang /
T02D1627:229a-48: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa mtshan
T02D1627:229b-0: dang dpe byad 'bar zhing nyi ma'i gdan la @229b
T02D1627:229b-1: gnas pa / mgon po'i gar gyi tshul lta bu //
T02D1627:229b-2: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1627:229b-3: yan lag drug tu dgod byas nas //
T02D1627:229b-4: mgon po dgug pa la sogs pas //
T02D1627:229b-5: dbang bskur rgyal ba mchod pa dang //
T02D1627:229b-6: bstod dang rjes chags la sogs pa'o //
T02D1627:229b-7: dbral ba mgrin pa mig gnyis dang /
T02D1627:229b-8: rna ba sna dang snying gar dgod //
T02D1627:229b-9: aom aa a'a khe tsi ra zhes pa'o //
T02D1627:229b-10: re pha'i steng du h'um byas te //
T02D1627:229b-11: rdo rje myur du mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1627:229b-12: ye shes dkyil 'khor rnam par dgug / mchod yon sbyin sogs sngon byas te //
T02D1627:229b-13: rang dang gcig tu gzhug par bya //
T02D1627:229b-14: 'khor lo gcig tu mnyam byas pas //
T02D1627:229b-16: zangs sogs khu bas byug pa yis //
T02D1627:229b-17: gser gyi dngos po 'grub pa ltar //
T02D1627:229b-18: snying nas snying po'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D1627:229b-19: phyogs bzhugs mgon po bskul byas te //
T02D1627:229b-20: 'od zer las byung rig ma rnams //
T02D1627:229b-21: bdud rtsi'i chus gang bum pa yis //
T02D1627:229b-22: rang gi spyi bor dbang bskur bas //
T02D1627:229b-23: mi bskyod gtso bo'i cod pan du'o //
T02D1627:229b-24: btsun mo bzang mo rnams la yang //
T02D1627:229b-25: rtag pa dang ni rin chen dbang //
T02D1627:229b-26: dpag med don yod grub pa rnams //
T02D1627:229b-27: dam pa'i mchod pas lag brel ba'i //
T02D1627:229b-28: mchog gi lha mo mnyam phyung ste ;
T02D1627:229b-29: / rnal 'byor ma dang bcas mchod cing //
T02D1627:229b-30: bdag nyid he ru ka bstod bya //
T02D1627:229b-31: mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa che //
T02D1627:229b-32: sngags kyi me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02D1627:229b-33: sha chen rab tu gsol mdzad pa //
T02D1627:229b-34: he ru ka dpal bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1627:229b-35: de dag ni bstod pa'i glu'o //
T02D1627:229b-36: mgo bo lte ba gsang gnas dang //
T02D1627:229b-37: brla gnyis la sogs rim bzhin du //
T02D1627:229b-38: aom h'um sv'a a'a:h'ar bcas pa'i //
T02D1627:229b-39: rigs lnga'i bdag nyid sa bon bsam //
T02D1627:229b-40: hr'i:yig dmar po chu skyes te //
T02D1627:229b-41: brum las byung ba'i ge sar ser //
T02D1627:229b-43: chags pas gzigs te dga' mos pa'i //
T02D1627:229b-44: lha mo bzhi la sogs pa rnams //
T02D1627:229b-45: glu yi dbyangs kyis bskul bar bsam //
T02D1627:229b-46: aom byung nor bu h'um rdo rje //
T02D1627:229b-47: rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad sogs pas //
T02D1627:229b-48: rgyal ba rjes su chags mdzad pa'i //
T02D1627:229b-49: dga' ba 'di ni brtsam par bya //
T02D1627:229b-50: rdo rje bad bskyod phat kyi sgras //
T02D1627:230a-1: nas kyang ni gzhug par bya //
T02D1627:230a-2: rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams bde bar ni //
T02D1627:230a-3: zhu ba las ni rdo rjer byung //
T02D1627:230a-4: de nas lce yi cho ga bzhin //
T02D1627:230a-5: padma las rang sems myong bya //
T02D1627:230a-6: snying gar 'byung ba bzhi dngos kyi //
T02D1627:230a-8: nyi ma zla gnas thig le la //
T02D1627:230a-9: kha sbyar shin tu bskor ba ni //
T02D1627:230a-10: pad rtsa'i skud 'dra'i ri mo ni //
T02D1627:230a-11: phyed bcas mdun gyi khyab yig tshar //
T02D1627:230a-12: sgra dang bcas te steng byung nas //
T02D1627:230a-13: de nas zla ba'i bu gar zhugs //
T02D1627:230a-15: brjod nas spro bar bya ba ni //
T02D1627:230a-16: srog dang rtsol ba bsdams nas su //
T02D1627:230a-17: sngags ni de bzhin slar bsdu ba'o //
T02D1627:230a-18: yi ge gsum gyi sgra yis ni //
T02D1627:230a-19: gzhug pa dang ni dbyung ba dang //
T02D1627:230a-20: steng du 'gro ba'i rlung gis ni //
T02D1627:230a-21: ye ge aom gyi sgras dbyung zhing //
T02D1627:230a-22: gzhug pa la ni bcug nas su //
T02D1627:230a-23: gnas bya la gnas rlung phra mo //
T02D1627:230a-24: thig le dkar po'i dbus su gnas //
T02D1627:230a-25: lte bar dbyangs dang gsal byed rgyus //
T02D1627:230a-26: ri mo phyed bcas bdun yon tan //
T02D1627:230a-27: gzhug dang gnas dang phyir dbyung ba //
T02D1627:230a-28: dal zhing dal bas gzhan mi 'gro //
T02D1627:230a-29: rab tu spyod pa'i sems kyis bsgom //
T02D1627:230a-31: 'di ni yi ge gsum bzlas pa'i sngags so //
T02D1627:230a-32: 'dod pa'i mchod sogs byas nas ldang //
T02D1627:230a-33: de nyid mthong zhing rnam grol bas //
T02D1627:230a-34: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal la bltas te //
T02D1627:230a-35: bde ba yongs su bsngo bar bya //
T02D1627:230a-36: bdag gis gang zhig byas bsod kyis //
T02D1627:230a-37: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bsgom gyur cing //
T02D1627:230a-38: de yis rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bdag /'gro mgon phun
T02D1627:230a-39: tshogs thob gyur cig / langs nas bsod snyoms la
T02D1627:230a-40: sogs dang // nyan dang bshad pa la sogs bya //
T02D1627:230a-41: rang gzhan he ru kar byas te //
T02D1627:230a-42: sgyu ma'i rnam pa bzhin du spyad //
T02D1627:230a-43: h'um gis kha zas byin brlabs te //
T02D1627:230a-44: aa las byung ba'i ka p'a lar //
T02D1627:230a-46: 'bar ba dri ma med byas te //
T02D1627:230a-47: steng du aom ni bsam byas te //
T02D1627:230a-48: bdud rtsi'i gzugs ni mngon bsngags la //
T02D1627:230a-49: lce rtser rdo rje bsam byas te //
T02D1627:230a-50: bkug ste de yis tshim par bya //
T02D1627:230a-51: aom a'a:h'um guhya bhaksha bhaksha ham /
T02D1627:230a-52: 'di ni bdud rtsi myang ba'i sngags so //
T02D1627:230a-53: khrus kyi dus su sngon bzhin du //
T02D1627:230b-0: dbang bskur cho ga sngon bzhin @230b bsgom //
T02D1627:230b-1: thun bzhi po ni thams cad du //
T02D1627:230b-2: de ltar bsgom zhing mnyam par gzhag / bdag gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro yi //
T02D1627:230b-3: sgrub thabs byas ba'i dge ba gang //
T02D1627:230b-4: thob pa des ni 'gro bdag nyid //
T02D1627:230b-5: de bzhin byed pas mdzes gyur cig / sgyu 'phrul
T02D1627:230b-6: chen mo'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i he ru
